title: WTA Chief Talks Money, China and Why Tennis Needs More Female Coaches
description: Even without China’s “zero-Covid” policy, Steve Simon said that unresolved concerns about Peng Shuai would keep women’s tennis away from Shenzhen and a lucrative 10-year-deal to stage the Finals.
dc:creator: Christopher Clarey

media:content.media:description: “We’re not going to compromise our principles,” Steve Simon, WTA chairman and chief executive, said about the continuing suspension of tournaments in China.
